channel.title: Pages on zayn_lie's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on zayn_lie's blog

item.title: About
item.description:
Zayn Lie

  • Account: zayn7lie (Email: $ echo "emF5bjdsaWUuYmVyNytibG9nQGdtYWlsLmNvbQo=" | base64 -d, please contact me with plain text or markdown, avoiding html, thanks)
  • Background: New York University, with Math and Computer Science majors, Music Minor
  • Field: Mostly focusing on theory and basis of Mathematics, now mostly focusing on Set Theory and Mathematical Logic. Used to engage in multiple algorithm competition like USACO, CodeForce, Olympiad in Informatics, and Machine Learning.
  • Habits: Tech geek(Arch Linux User (with Hyprland), Server Constructor, A/V supporter for some facilities, etc.), music appreciation (music theory) and piano performance, Osu!, story games (e.g. Arknights, Ender Lilies, Lobotomy Corporation), open world games (e.g. Unturned, Terraria, Minecraft)
  • Principle: Idealism, Open-sourcism, Pacifism, Logicism, Anti-nationalism
  • Style: Hardcore, Artcore, Hard Renascence, Dorian modal music

泽忚

  • 账号：zayn7lie, zayn_lie, zaynXlie (邮箱：$ echo "emF5bjdsaWUuYmVyNytibG9nQGdtYWlsLmNvbQo=" | base64 -d，請用 plain text 或 markdown 與我聯繫，避免使用 html，感謝)
  • 学历：目前就读于 New York University ，双主修数学和计算机科学，辅修音樂（音樂倫理）
  • 领域：偏基礎理论研究类蒟蒻，目前專注於集合論和數學邏輯。曾喜欢游荡于各大竞赛（ Google Code Jam ， CodeForce 等）和曾經研究机器学习算法。
  • 爱好：科技宅（ Arch Linux 用户（窗口管理器 Hyprland），服务器搭建，为几个机构提供影音支持等），音乐鉴赏（音乐伦理）和钢琴演奏， Osu! ，剧情类游戏（明日方舟，Ender Lilies, 脑叶公司等），部分开放式游戏（ Unturned, Terraria, Minecraft 等）
  • 观念：理想主义，开源主义，和平主义，逻辑主义，反民族主义
  • 风格：热爱音乐伦理与音游，对于 BMS 的音乐有着无可抗拒的诱惑力。喜欢 Hardcore, Artcore, Hard Renascence 风格电子乐、交响乐和钢琴曲；凯尔特和华丽日式的合奏；混有例如皮卡第三度突出和弦的音乐。特别重视旋律，但不怎么在乎节奏。

item.title: Links
item.description:
Note. The Friend Connections section aims at connecting and expanding different open-source communities. I am happy to share links mutually with anyone having created their own posts with high quality. If you want to create friend connections mutually with me, please contact me with Blog Email in About section using following format (Please remove the example comments after completion):

  - title: "Blog Name"
    description: "Blog Description"
    website: "Blog url"
    image: "Blog Image url"

As for my link:

  - title: "zayn_lie's blog"
    description: "Algorithm&Mathematics, Music_Theory&Rhythm_Game, Rationality&Logicism, Peace&Open_Source"
    website: "https://zayn7lie.ber7.org/"
    image: "https://zayn7lie.ber7.org/img/avatar_hu82b799b075fce224917976c46abb1b25_217862_300x0_resize_box_3.png"
